_header: Done is a battle on the dragon black
_description: William Dunbar, ‘On the Resurrection’ — five 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) including the refrain, ‘Surrexit Dominus de sepulchro’

Banna.First Lines:
Done is a battell on þe dragon blakour campioun chryst
                        counq confountit hes his force…
Banna.Last Lines:
…dispulit of þe tresur þat he ȝemit Surrexit
                        dominus de sepulchro
